HEADER.Title: Check if file at a given path exists

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME#
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" set /a error=0 : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Source file &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a error=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a error=1 > nul ) )
: CASE "UNIX" error=0 : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ $EXIST -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER error=1 else if [ $ISFILE -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER error=1 fi fi : OTHER :ENDSWITCH
